Module Fit_Diet_Planner
Package object

Class Food

java.lang.Object
object.LibraryItem
object.Food
public class Food extends LibraryItem
Represents a food item in the library system.

A Food is a specific type of LibraryItem that stores nutritional information such as calories per gram, grams per serving, and category (e.g., Produce, Grain, Protein, Dairy).

    • Food

      public Food(String id, String name, LibraryItem.LibraryType libraryType, Food.FoodCategory category, double caloriePerG, double gramPerServing)
      Constructs a new Food with a specific ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the food item
      name - the name of the food
      libraryType - the type of library item
      category - the food category
      caloriePerG - calories per gram of the food
      gramPerServing - grams per serving size

      gramPerServing - grams per serving size

  • Method Details

    • validate

      public void validate()
      Validates this food object to ensure its values are valid.

      This includes checking that the name is not empty, and that calories and serving size are greater than zero.

      Specified by:
      validate in class LibraryItem
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails
